display_long_description:
# Dang right you can pet that dog! Get it some boops and some pats too! #

Studies show that petting a dog releases natural chemicals to relieve stress and reduce depression and boost health!!

We want you to be able to relax and enjoy your time, so there are no quests, rules or time limits here. You can pet, pat, boop or feed your little companions as much as your heart desires... or don't, it's all up to you!!

**Selection of dogs**
+ 5 adorable puppers to choose from.
+ NEW interactive reactions to Pets, Pats, Boops and Treats!

**Multiple Locations**
+ 3 different peaceful scenes to enjoy

**Interactive treat dispenser**
+ 6 different treats to feed to your doggo.

**Record player** - allows you to play some random chill music, or make a playlist, to add to your relaxation.
+ Default songs, 16 total.
+ Unlockable Records, 33 total.

**Meta Achievements** - collect and compare with your friends!!
+ 37 Achievements

-_------------------------------_-

**Future Plans:**
- More locations to enjoy
- A HUGE selection of DLC Dogs and Animal packs to add to your pet collection!!

-_------------------------------_-

# Comfort Settings

**Turning**
- Real, Smooth & Snap Turning ✔
- Adjustable increments & speed✔

**Movement**
- Real, Smooth & Teleport Movement ✔
- Adjustable speed ✔
- Head-based ✔

**Posture**
- Standing & Seated mode ✔
- Real & Artificial crouch ✔
- Adjustable player height ✔

**Accessibility**
- Game Text: English
- Dialogue audio: none
- Two hands required ✖
- Hearing required ✖
- Blinders ✖
